trans-unit.source: Specifies the visibility of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> for scrollable content.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a visibilidade de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> para conteúdo deslocável.

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> property values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> control.
trans-unit.target: Utilize esta enumeração para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>valores de propriedade do <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>controlo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: The member values of this enumeration specify <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> visibility in a given direction.
trans-unit.target: Especificam os valores de membro desta enumeração <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>visibilidade numa direção especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>

trans-unit.source: These member values also specify whether the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> dimension is applied to its enclosed content.
trans-unit.target: Estes valores de membro também especificam se correspondente <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>dimensão é aplicada para o respetivo conteúdo incluído.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When you apply the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> content, you set the viewport size for the content.
trans-unit.target: Quando aplica a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>conteúdo, defina o tamanho da janela viewport para o conteúdo.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> appears and the dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> is applied to the content when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> aparece e a dimensão do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> é aplicada ao conteúdo, quando a janela viewport não é possível apresentar todo o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the width of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>. For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the height of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a largura do conteúdo é definida o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>. Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a altura do conteúdo está definida como o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> does not appear even when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> não for apresentada, mesmo quando a janela viewport não é possível apresentar a todo o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the content is set to the corresponding dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> parent.
trans-unit.target: A dimensão do conteúdo está definida para a dimensão de correspondente a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> principal.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the width of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>. For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the height of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a largura do conteúdo é definida o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>. Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a altura do conteúdo está definida como o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref> does not appear even when the viewport cannot display all of the content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref> não for apresentada, mesmo quando a janela viewport não é possível apresentar a todo o conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> is not applied to the content.
trans-unit.target: A dimensão do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> não se aplica ao conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The dimension of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref> is applied to the content.
trans-unit.target: A dimensão do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref> é aplicada ao conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: For a horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the width of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>. For a vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"></xref>, the height of the content is set to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight*> of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Para um horizontal <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a largura do conteúdo é definida o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>. Para um vertical <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar"> </xref>, a altura do conteúdo está definida como o <> </> *> do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer"> </xref>.
